Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Under Regulations 30 33 And 52(1) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 As Amended (SEBI Listing Regulations)
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that pursuant to the applicable provisions of the SEBI Listing Regulations the Board of Directors (the Board) of Jindal Stainless Limited (the Company) at its meeting held today i.e. 06th August 2025 inter alia considered and approved the unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025. Copy of the aforesaid results along with the Limited Review Report(s) are enclosed herewith.

Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we would like to inform you that the Q1FY26 earnings call is being organised by Motilal Oswal Financial Services on behalf of the Company with the investors and analysts on Thursday 07th August 2025 at 04:00 P.M. (1ST).
 
Please note that the above schedule may undergo a change due to exigencies on the part of Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Prior Intimation Of The Board Meeting Pursuant To Regulation 29 And 50 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations).
data.news_body:
Jindal Stainless Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 06/08/2025 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025.

Further as intimated by our letter dated 27th June 2025 the trading window in terms of Companys Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading and SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 was closed with effect from 01st July 2025 until the second trading day after the declaration of unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter ended 30th June 2025. Accordingly the trading window for dealing in securities of the Company shall now re-open on 09th August 2025.
